application.model

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.model.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Inventory stores the data for all of the Kiosk's products.
    Author:

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Inventory()
      Loads the inventory's data from the application's files.

      • addNewProduct

        public java.lang.Integer addNewProduct(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String description,
                                       java.lang.Integer id,
                                       int stockCount,
                                       double price)
        Adds new items to the Kiosk's inventory based on the input provided by an Admin user.
        Parameters:
        name - The new Product's given name.
        description - The new Product's given description.
        id - The new Product's given ID.
        stockCount - The new Product's given stock amount.
        price - The new Product's given price.
        Returns:
        - An Integer object or null if the new product was successfully added to the inventory.

        Increases the stock amount of a Product specified by an Admin or Employee user.
        Parameters:

        stockAdd - The number of stock to add for the Product.
